text: Nimen weihe bu wei an la zhi dao shiyong ne [zhu]? Tiandi jian de yiqie [yichan] dou shi an la de. Nimen zhong gongke [mai jia] qian shiyong bing canzhan zhe, tong qita ren [gongke mai jia hou shiyong bing canzhan zhe] shi bu xiangdeng de. Zhexie ren [gongke mai jia qian shiyong bing canzhan zhe] bi cihou shiyong bing canzhan zhe juyou geng gao de pinji. Dan an la dui mei zhong ren dou xu gei youmei de baochou. Fanshi nimen suo zuo de, an la shi che zhi de.
